title: Assign Member To Vehicle Temporary Request V5
description: Request body of an assignment of a member to a vehicle temporary. Endpoint: https://wh.route4me.com/modules/api/v5.0/vehicles/assign

assigned_member_id.title: Assigned Member ID
assigned_member_id.description: A unique ID of a member assigned to the vehicle.

expires_at.title: Expires At
expires_at.description: When will the assignment of a member to a vehicle expire (Unix timestamp).

force-assignment.title: Force Assignment
force-assignment.description: If true, the temporary assignment of a member to a vehicle will be forced.
